thread.title: Ghana defender Jeffrey Schlupp reveals why he snubbed England and Germany to play for Black Stars
thread.title_full: Ghana defender Jeffrey Schlupp reveals why he snubbed England and Germany to play for Black Stars

title: Ghana defender Jeffrey Schlupp reveals why he snubbed England and Germany to play for Black Stars
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 23:25 CET Ghana defender Jeffrey Schlupp reveals why he snubbed England and Germany to play for Black Stars - www.ghanasoccernet.com Jeffrey Schlupp 
Leicester City’s Jeffrey Schlupp has revealed why he chose to play for Ghana instead of representing either Germany or England. 
The 22-year-old versatile wing-half was born in Hamburg – Germany to Ghanaian parents and moved to Milton Keynes – England at the age of 10 but did not consider playing for any of the two European giants. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
